title: Inventory Management System
description: Inventory Management System using Java, Spring Boot, Spring MVC, Spring Security Thymeleaf, PostgreSQL and Docker.

title: URL Shortener
description: A URL Shortener app made using Go, PostgreSQL and Angular. URL Redirect, Creation, Management and Deletion of long URLs.

title: DevOps CI/CD
description: A CI/CD pipeline for automating the deployment of web applications using Jenkins, GitHub Actions and Docker.

title: Smart Home IoT System
description: A full smart home setup using ESP32-S3 and Go-powered backend on AWS. Features MQTT messaging, occupancy detection, environmental monitoring, and a web dashboard.

title: Authenticator App
description: Secure 2-factor authenticator app built with React Native and Expo. Supports TOTP generation and QR code scanning with secure on-device storage.

title: gotenv
description: A Go package designed to load environment variables from a .env file into your application. Minimalist and easy to integrate.

title: Blog App
description: Full-stack blog application using Spring Boot, PostgreSQL, Next.js, and TypeScript. Features include secure authentication and responsive UI.
